subject: JUnitPerf
msgSnippet: JUnitPerf is a collection of JUnit test decorators used to measure the performance and scalability of functionality contained within existing JUnit tests. The
messageBody:
JUnitPerf is a collection of JUnit test decorators used to measure the
performance and scalability of functionality contained within existing
JUnit tests.

The TimerTest test decorator runs a test and measures the elapsed time.
If the specified maximum elapsed time is exceeded, then the test fails.
The LoadTest test decorator runs a test with a simulated number of
concurrent users and iterations, and can be further decorated with a
TimerTest to test the overall elapsed time.

These extensions were formerly described in the JUnit Primer as the load
testing extensions, but they've recently been refactored into a separate
downloadable distribution described at...

http://www.clarkware.com/software/JUnitPerf.html


Enjoy!

Mike
